{{flavour|A very rare and extremely effective imported weapon, featuring a long single-edged blade.}}
{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the Long Blades category. It can be used with one hand, or more effectively with two (i.e. when not using a shield), and it is better for the dexterous.}}

The '''katana''' is a one-and-a-half handed [[Long Blades|Long Blade]] with excellent base stats. It provides the same damage as a [[demon blade]], but has better accuracy and more importantly, a better minimum delay.

==History==
In [[0.10]], Bloodbane was converted from a katana to a demon blade, and the unrand [[Autumn Katana]] was introduced to replace it as the sole remaining katana. The Autumn Katana actually has slightly better base stats than mundane katanas did: 14 damage, +3 accuracy, 12 base delay.

In [[0.9]], they were mostly removed from the game, with the unrand [[Bloodbane]] being the only one remaining.

Katanas could be randomly generated up until [[0.8]] with a generation probability similar to that of a [[quick blade]] or an [[executioner's axe]].
